author: Ivan Mehta
title: Daily Distraction: Free lessons and stories to keep your kids occupied during lockdown
description: In ideal circumstances, kids would enjoy having no school and being at home. But when you throw in online classes and no going out to play, it might not be a pleasant stay after all. During this long-lasting lockdown, parents might have to conjure up all kind…
content:
